pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compare Output and Run Time // Quickly run experiments to compare the run time and output of code blocks. The function mbc() can make fast comparisons of code, and will calculate statistics comparing the resulting outputs. It can be used to compare model fits to the same data or see which function runs faster. The R6 class ffexp$new() runs a function using all possible combinations of selected inputs. This is useful for comparing the effect of different parameter values. It can also run in parallel and automatically save intermediate results, which is very useful for long computations.
